item.description:
Chris Young was arrested and charged for speaking out against the Health Care Bill and giving Patrick Kennedy a DVD at one of the recent Town Hall Forums.

The Chris Young court date is on Feb 17 at 8 AM outside the Providence Municipal Court House (with the glass windows). Also, feel free to stop by and join the group protesting the bill.

You may not agree with all that Chris believes, but his 1st Amendment Right was clearly violated. There is no law about speaking too long or too loudly at a Town Hall Forum, or gently lobbing a DVD toward a table to the open hands of a Congressman who can't catch.


(from):


http://www.meetup.com...
item.name: SUPPORT CHRIS YOUNG!
